title: Transportation Network
description: A network to describe a transportation system at a port.

directed.description: Indicator of whether the graph is directed

graph.description: Contains metadata about the transportation network

links.description: List of edges in the transportation network

capacity.description: The total capacity of the node (for all commodities)

cargo_categories.description: List of cargo types supported by the link

cost.description: The (non-temporal) cost of using an edge

nbr_containers.description: The number of containers on the edge

source.description: The name for the edge's source node

target.description: The name for the edge's target node

travel_time.description: The time for all commodities to move across an edge

multigraph.description: Indicates whether this is a multigraph

nodes.description: List of nodes in the transportation network

capacity.description: The total capacity of the node for all commodities

cost.description: The (non-temporal) cost of servicing a commodity at the node location

extended_time_period.description: If the commodity stays at the node longer than this time period (in minutes), then additional costs are incurred

extended_time_rate.description: If a commodity stays at the node longer than the extended time period, costs are incurred at this rate (dollars/minute)

nbr_containers.description: The number of containers at the node

service_time.description: The time to service any commodity at the location

storage.description: The total storage capacity of the node for all commodities
